Title: Learn To Ride
Description: It's time for you to learn how to ride! Seek out Revi Ramrod in Orgrimmar's Valley of Spirits. Don't forget to buy your mount while you are there!
PortraitGiverText: Find Revi Ramrod and learn how to ride a mount!
RewardText: Don't forget to buy your mount while you are here! You can buy one from Kall Worthaton over there.
